mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_tb ( user_id, job, skill, min_years, max_years, project_start, expected_period, period, salary_type, working_style, meeting, address, worktime, work_adjust, vacation, progress, main_tasks, detail_task, delivered, files, company, manager_name, contact, email, agree ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{job}, #{skill}, #{minYears}, #{maxYears}, #{projectStart}, #{expectedPeriod}, #{period}, #{salaryType}, #{workingStyle}, #{meeting}, #{address}, #{worktime}, #{workAdjust}, #{vacation}, #{progress}, #{mainTasks}, #{detailTask}, #{delivered}, #{files}, #{company}, #{managerName}, #{contact}, #{email}, #{agree} )
